testsuite.name: com.sample.google.Login.verifications.LoginIndex
testsuite.system-out:
Step 1:-Goto This Link https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin
Step 2:-Enter Valid Email & Password and Press Enter
Step 3:-Now, Verify the login details
Login is Successful
Entered Email is : jaymukul6@gmail.com
Pass

Step 1:-Goto This Link https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin
Step 2:-Enter Email and Press Enter
Step 3:-Then, Keep the Password Blank, and Press Enter
Step 4:-Now, Verify the validation message for blank password
Validation Message : Enter a password
Pass

Step 1:-Goto This Link https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin
Step 2:-Enter Valid Email & Invalid Password and Press Enter
Step 3:-Now, Verify the validation message for invalid password
Validation Message : Wrong password. Try again or click Forgot password to reset it.
Pass

Step 1:-Goto This Link https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin
Step 2:-Keep the Invalid Email, and Press Enter
Step 3:-Now, Verify the validation message for invalid email
DETAILS Entered
email:jaymukul6@test.com
Validation Message : Couldn't find your Google Account
Pass

Step 1:-Goto This Link https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin
Step 2:-Keep the Email Blank, and Press Enter

email:
